field.name: gallery_skin
field.label: Gallery Skin
field.description: the global skin of the gallery. Will change all gallery items by default.

field.name: gallery_images_preload_type
field.label: Images Preload Type
field.description:
The images preload type.
minimal - only image nabours will be loaded each time.
visible - visible thumbs images will be loaded each time.
all - load all the images first time.

field.name: gallery_play_interval
field.label: Play Interval
field.description: play interval of the slideshow. after that time the slide will change

field.name: gallery_pause_on_mouseover
field.label: Pause Playing on Mouseover
field.description: pause on mouseover when playing slideshow

field.name: gallery_mousewheel_role
field.label: Mouse Wheel Role
field.description: The role of mouse wheel. Zoom image, advance items, or none

field.name: gallery_control_keyboard
field.label: Keyboard Control
field.description: Allow to control gallery with keyboard (left, right arrows)

field.name: gallery_carousel
field.label: Carousel Mode
field.description: next button on last image goes to first image.

field.name: gallery_preserve_ratio
field.label: Preserve Ratio On Resize
field.description: Preserve width and height ratio on gallery resize

field.name: slider_background_color
field.label: Gallery Background Color
field.description: set custom background color on slider area. If not set it will be taken from css

field.name: slider_background_opacity
field.label: Gallery Background Opacity
field.description: The opacity of the gallery background. Set to 0 for transparent background, and give some color
